name: ghostlet
description:
made for ludum dare 50

revive yourself during your death animation to delay your eventual and inevitable death (which is probably of old age and not spikes or bullets)

use WASD / Arrow Keys to move

use K to jump

hold down K while in your death animation to turn into a GHOST!

use WASD/ Arrow Keys as a ghost to float around and phase through walls!

press R to restart

press , and . to go to the next/previous level


sounds effects made with sfxr (thanks :>)
